    • setTargetPosition

      public Pattern.Builder setTargetPosition(int w, int h)
      Set the target position as a percent of the width and height of the image. For width, 0 is the leftmost point and 100 the rightmost point.
      Parameters:
      w - percent of width
      h - percent of height
      Returns:
      the Builder

      Parameters:

      y - move y by
      Returns:
      the Builder
